_sText:
After creating aim_island, my first map, I got a private message from TempletonPeck asking to improve the map so he could place it on his gungame server. So I improved my map and here is the result:

- Removed the weapons+tables at both spawns.
- Removed 2 fishes and repositioned the remaining 2.
- Removed the sign from the buoy.
- Added a seagull on the buoy.
- Added an extra ladder on both spawns.
- Added more spawnpoints (each spawn has 16 now).
- Added a bunch of tree's.
- Added a lot of rocks for cover.
- Added a sun.
- Added a soundscape.
- Added a 3d skybox representing endless water.
- Extended the map border, I made it bigger, people can walk a bit in the surrounding water now.

In this map you'll spawn with a knife only, the gungame mod has to do the rest. I can make custom map versions with guns lying on the ground at request. Thats it, have fun!
